page.title: 11Farming Machinery
page.content: The most expensive piece of machinery which is used at Bagley Farm in 1985 is the{combine harvester}which, when new, costs around{Â£60,000.}The farmer prefers the{baler}which makes round bales to the one which makes square bales because they can use a{fork lift for handling round bales but the square bales have to have men to lift them and this is heavy work. He owns { {4 tractors}one of which is a fork lift tractor. He keeps his tractors for about four or five years before he changes them.A tractor can cost{ {Â£12000.}Other implements he uses include a{plough,}which is used to turn over the land and a {power {harrow,}which is used to make a fine seed bed.A power harrow costs{Â£3000.} If any machinery breaks down he will repair it himself but if it is a serious fault he will ask a mechanic.
